extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    ANAT 309/3.0, and Level 4 and (a GPA of 2.5 and registration in a LISC Major or Specialization Plan) or permission of the Department of Biomedical and Molecular Sciences.

basic.description:
A focused histological and cell biological study of three selected mammalian tissues, organs and/or systems.
NOTE    Laboratory consumables: estimated cost $25.
basic.subject: ANAT
basic.title: Selected Topics in Histology
